title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Comparative Study on the Impact of Feedback Absence on Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more specific impacts of feedback deficiency on learning motivation, comprehension, and performance
Learners can propose feedback system improvement plans by comparing instructional design methodologies
Learners can perform practical assignments designing peer feedback systems using formative assessment tools in online environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
